participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and adventurous, enjoys trying new things and spending time with family.
participant_1.background: I don't like fast food, but I love a good cup of chai tea. I am a gourmet cook. I'm going to watch the Nascar race on Sunday and then pretend to be a superhero with my kids. My favorite jello is the blue one. I practice yoga daily.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, loves outdoor activities and family time.
participant_2.background: I try to do laundry once or twice a week. I love going to the movies. My mommy makes me a picnic lunch to eat outside. I am short. My father used to be a butcher.

content.text: What is your favorite movie you have seen?
I really enjoyed the movie "The Secret Life of Walter Mitty" it was so cool!
I've heard good things about that movie. I'm not a big movie person but I like to watch the Nascar races on Sunday.
Oh I've never been to one! I don't know anything about racing but it sounds exciting.
It is really exciting! I'm going to watch the race on Sunday and then pretend to be a superhero with my kids.
Superheroes are so cool! My mommy makes me picnic lunches to eat outside when we go to the movies.
That's so nice of her! I love picnics. I'm a gourmet cook and my favorite jello is blue.
How fun! I'm not very tall so I can't reach the top shelves in the kitchen but my daddy helps me.
That's sweet of your daddy. I practice yoga daily to stay in shape.
Oh I really want to be more flexible! My mommy says I'm too short to be a gymnast.
That doesn't mean you can't be flexible! I'm sure your mommy is just teasing you.
I hope so! I really want to be a superhero when I grow up
